response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance the value of your business or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I am confident it would be a valuable addition to your collection. Considering its intrinsic worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering this product to you for $12,000. This price not only reflects the true value of the product but also provides you with an opportunity to acquire it at a competitive advantage compared to the market rate. I look forward to hearing your response and potentially discussing how this product can contribute to your success.", "product_price": 12000}
